code: import React,{Component}from"react";import{Doughnut}from"react-chartjs-2";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import"./IssueChart.css";import IssueData from"../../shared/opensource/issues.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class IssueChart extends Component{render(){const data={labels:["Open","Closed"],datasets:[{data:[IssueData["open"],IssueData["closed"]],backgroundColor:["#28a745","#d73a49"],hoverBackgroundColor:["#28a745dd","#d73a49dd"]}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"issue-chart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:2000,distance:"20px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"issue-chart-header",children:"Issue Distribution"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Doughnut,{data:data,options:{margin:"0",padding:"0",responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:true,animation:{duration:4000}}})]});}}export default IssueChart;
